hero.title: Transform Your Restaurant with Smart Digital Menus
hero.description: Create stunning QR code menus, enable contactless ordering, and provide an exceptional dining experience. All managed through our powerful CMS platform.

features.title: Everything You Need for Modern Dining
features.description: Our comprehensive digital menu solution includes all the features your restaurant needs to provide an exceptional customer experience.

enterpriseCms.title: Enterprise CMS
enterpriseCms.description: Complete control over your menu with our powerful content management system. Add, edit, and organize your menu items with ease.

qrCodeGeneration.title: QR Code Generation
qrCodeGeneration.description: Instantly generate QR codes for contactless menu access. Customers can scan and browse your menu safely.

digitalOrdering.title: Digital Ordering
digitalOrdering.description: Let customers add items to their basket and create orders directly from their phones.

orderSharing.title: Order Sharing
orderSharing.description: Customers can share their orders via WhatsApp, email, or any social platform for easy group ordering.

mobileOptimized.title: Mobile Optimized
mobileOptimized.description: Fully responsive design that works perfectly on all devices - phones, tablets, and desktops.

multiLanguageSupport.title: Multi-language Support
multiLanguageSupport.description: Serve international customers with support for multiple languages and currencies.

247PrioritySupport.title: 24/7 Priority Support
247PrioritySupport.description: Get instant help when you need it most. Our dedicated support team is available around the clock to ensure your restaurant never misses a beat.

testimonials.title: Trusted by Restaurants Worldwide
testimonials.description: Join hundreds of restaurants that have transformed their customer experience with our digital menu solution.

first.name: Sarah Johnson
first.content: This digital menu solution transformed our customer experience. Orders are more accurate and our staff can focus on service.

second.name: Mike Chen
second.content: The QR code feature was a game-changer during COVID. Now customers prefer it even post-pandemic!

third.name: Elena Rodriguez
third.content: Easy to set up, beautiful design, and our customers love sharing orders with friends. Highly recommended!

fourth.name: James Wilson
fourth.content: The CMS is incredibly intuitive. I can update our menu in minutes, and it reflects instantly for customers.

fifth.name: Maria Santos
fifth.content: Our revenue increased by 30% after implementing clicknbite. The ordering system is seamless!

sixth.name: David Kim
sixth.content: Multi-language support helped us serve our diverse customer base better. Fantastic platform!

pricing.title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
pricing.description: One comprehensive plan with all features included. Choose your billing cycle and get started today.

plan.title: Professional Plan
plan.description: Everything you need to run a modern restaurant

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Restaurant to the Next Level?
cta.description: Join hundreds of successful restaurants using clicknbite to provide exceptional dining experiences. Start your digital transformation today.

footer.logoDescription: Empowering restaurants with modern digital menu solutions for the future of dining.

header.title: Let's Transform Your Restaurant
header.description: Ready to provide your customers with a modern dining experience? Get in touch with our team to get started.
